website_summaries.verdict: The Alcatel One Touch Idol 3 4.7 is an affordable and compact unlocked smartphone that punches above its weight on performance, but it's still hard to recommend over the Moto G.

customer_reviews.title: Caution, only 8gb Internal Storage!
customer_reviews.text: This version of the phone has only 8gb of internal storage, there is a micro SD slot but only a few apps are movable to this. Every time I wanted to download a new app there was not enough internal storage left so I had to delete something else to make room. It's a nice little phone if you only use a few apps, but it wasn't good for my needs so I returned it and bought the 5.5" version, this has 16gb so much better. I cannot speak highly enough of Amazon's returns procedure though, they could not have made it much easier for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a while...
customer_reviews.text: After about a year, volume buttons started to give out, power button is 50/50 and the battery can barely keep it's charge steady whilst plugged into a USB port and browsing the internet, continues to deplete if watching video content regardless of being plugged in. Best not to give in to unknown brands to save a bit of money, it'll just give your problems in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone, fast, light, stylish. Plays the latest games and apps, never noticed any lags or slow downs, even after having it on for several days. The speakers are simply amazing, they are better and louder than my laptops one. Truly recommend for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Marmo

customer_reviews.title: Great Little phone
customer_reviews.text: A great little phone, and what I like it has two speakers which are a great help as I am quite deaf. would recommend this phone to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pen set

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but some bugs.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a present. Took it out of the box to see if maybe I want one for myself too. Tried to watch some youtube video in fullscreen and landscape and then half of the screen started to flicker with blue in every 5 seconds or so. Unacceptable. What else would come out if I would use it more? I sent it back. Otherwise seemed like a nice phone. Would have bought one for myself too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent value for cost. Use for phone, text, WWW, email, facebook, whatsapp, camera
customer_reviews.author: orkfay

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Deliveered super quick
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Deliveered super quick. Second one I have bought. The first was for my daughter and because it was so good i bought one. That didn't go down well with her street cred but mine went up.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've had this phone for some time now and am reasonably happy with it. There is however a problem with videos. When recording only approx. 95% of the viewed area is recorded. This is not the case with stills which are full area. I will be taking this up with Alcatel since I have not noticed this with other smart phones.
customer_reviews.author: wizard60

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the more expensive Z3 Compact and prefer this. Lovely in the hand, simple design, loud, and the flip screen trick is nice (although would be better if it physical buttons were on both ends).
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The first time it fell on the ground, the screen was shattered to million pieces
customer_reviews.author: Frank087234

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for entry-level or moderate smartphone user
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. Not a connoisseur of smartphones, it may fall short of others' desires, but for me it's perfect. Responsive and high-definition touchscreen, can handle a moderate number of apps with ease, good camera (apparently not as good as other devices, but I don't really care) and a micros card slot. Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil3000

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, slim phone that worked brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, slim phone that worked brilliantly ... till it didn't. I don't like that you can't open it up or take the battery out, but one day it just wouldn't switch on any more. Tried everything but it was just dead. This was about 5 months after getting it. It's a shame, because it was great up till then - decent camera, very sleek, quick. Then a paperweight, for no reason.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, such a lot for your money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, such a lot for your money, it will be interesting to see how it performs over a long period. A couple of concerns, 1) it has happened couple of times now, when I have finished a call and put it to sleep for some reason it dialled a number completely randomly. 2) it says it has 4G capability but it does not detect my 4G Router at all, no matter where I place it. Also does it have a SD Card facility??
customer_reviews.author: Maz3755

customer_reviews.title: OK Phone - low enough specs
customer_reviews.text: only 8gb storage and cant upgrade to Android 7 - fairly run of the mill
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Fahy

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel 4.7 Phone
customer_reviews.text: As with all other Alcatel phones purchased I am not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scoobie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke after a few months, would stay clear! Amazon refunded me thankfully!
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this little phone, so responsive, lovely crisp screen, photos are great, and sound is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, a bargain for that price (99£)
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! Nice product, a bargain for that price (99£) :)
customer_reviews.author: Santiago Casas

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for the price and have been impressed by the performance. The only downside is the internal memory which is approximately 4.8 GB, but adding an micro SD card could fix this...
customer_reviews.author: Imi Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: my dad is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present, my dad is very happy with it. Excellent quality, beautiful design. Thin and light.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolett F.

customer_reviews.title: Good price Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great introduction to smart phone technology with a 13 mega pixel camera and the potential to store picture and music libraries its a mobile entertainment center.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dinwoodie

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT PHONE, I HAVE HAD SONY SAMSUNG I PHONES ...
customer_reviews.text: BRILLIANT PHONE,I HAVE HAD SONY SAMSUNG I PHONES ETC .BUT THIS PHONE IS A LOT BETTER THAN THEM THE PICTURE QUALITY THE SOUND AND SPEED IS FAST ,THE BEST EVER
customer_reviews.author: MR P HEWITT

customer_reviews.title: I've had iPhone 4 and 5 also Samsung s6 which ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had iPhone 4 and 5 also Samsung s6 which was stolen was hesitant buying this phone I got the black Friday deal this phone and watch both £100 am impressed it has jbl speakers Sony camera and Internet is quite fast cash complain paying £50 for the phone plus is unlocked to all networks
customer_reviews.author: Harvinder

customer_reviews.title: Alcatel OneTouch Idol 3.
customer_reviews.text: This is an effective and reasonably priced smartphone, that can do everything it's more expensive counterparts do, at an acceptable price point. The only (minor) niggle that I have with this phone is that the battery life is not as extensive as I hoped it would be. It falls between the iPhone (poor) & the Windows Lumia (excellent). Having said that, I certainly have no hesitation in recommending this neat & rather nifty phone .
customer_reviews.author: catherine

product_meta.title: Alcatel ONETOUCH IDOL 3 (4.7) SIM-Free Smartphone – Dark Grey
product_meta.description:
With a crisp 1.7" screen, the Alcatel Idol 3 is a perfect smartphone for on the move

BOX CONTAINS
Alcatel Onetouch Smartphone
User Guide
Mains Charger
feature_bullets: 13 mega-pixel main camera, and 8 mega-pixel front camera
Micro SD slot supporting up to 128GB
